ygData.subject: Re: Bard envy
ygData.msgSnippet: *****sigh* Not more complaining and whining =(.  As usual people constantly complain left and right about how x class gets this and it s better than what I
ygData.messageBody:
*****sigh* Not more complaining and whining =(. As usual people
constantly complain left and right about how x class gets this and it's
better than what I get. You know what?? I think we are deserving of
armour that is more powerful than those of the Rogues and Rangers. As of
late I am finding my melee to be useless, most of my songs are good for
groups provided I have a healer watch me. IT makes up for the bard hate
problem. Oh well....

Treilanin Loreweaver
Honour Guard, Karana

On Wed, 13 Oct 1999, John Robertson wrote:

> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
> Yep, it's true. Rangers and Rogues in particular are complaining up a storm about how good the
> bard armour is compared to theirs.
>
> Take a moment to glow in their envy before we come back down to earth. :)
>
> Jyzan
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.
>
